modelPackage

Class Move

  • java.lang.Object
    • modelPackage.Move

  • public class Move
extends java.lang.Object
    Move is a class definition for a checkers piece move. Two board squares are involved in a move: 1) a from square 2) a to square Let the checkers piece being moved be denoted as the fromPiece, and let the checkers piece that is removed, if one is in fact removed, be denoted as the toPiece. The information stored by a Move is sufficient for a move undo.
    Author:

      The Move constructor initializes the two squares in a move from a string description of the move.

      • isMoveToDifferentLocation

        private boolean isMoveToDifferentLocation()
        A valid Move consists of a move from any square on the board, denoted by "from", to some other square, on the board, denoted by "to"; i.e. the squares must be two distinctly different locations.
        Returns:
        boolean is it a move to a different location?

      • isMoveOverEmptySquares

        private boolean isMoveOverEmptySquares(ICheckersPiece[][] board)
        The isMoveOverEmptySquares method returns : 1) true - if all squares exclusively between the "from" square and the "to" square are empty. 2) false - if at least one square between the "from" square and the "to" square is occupied.

        Returns:
